description: Try our easy to follow Danish Pastries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pastries,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Sesame free,Peanut free,Father's Day,Stone fruit
name: Danish Pastries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheet frozen puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line two large baking trays with baking paper.

Cut each pastry sheet into 4 squares. Transfer to trays. Using a small sharp knife, make a right-angled cut in 2 of the corners, 1cm in from the edge. Gently lift a cut corner and fold over the centre. Repeat with other corner, tucking one under the other.
Place 1 tbs custard in the centre. Top with an apricot half, cut side down. Repeat for all 8 squares.
Brush pastry with egg. Sprinkle with almonds and sugar. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and puffed.
